mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS title, p.price AS price, p.main_image_url AS thumbnailUrl, p.region_display_name AS regionName, p.like_count AS likeCount, p.created_at AS createdTime FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_id = #{categoryId} OR c.parent_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
